PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElementAssemblyTypeSteadyDevice
PropertySetDef.Definition: Energy steady device properties used in railway. The property set can be used by the predefined type SUSPENSION_ASSEMBLY of IfcElementAssembly.

PropertyDef.Name: AssemblyInstruction
PropertyDef.Definition: Instructions to describe how the system / equipment / facility is assembled.

PropertyDef.Name: ContactWireStagger
PropertyDef.Definition: Lateral displacement of the contact wire to opposite sides of the track centre at successive supports.

PropertyDef.Name: IsSetOnWorkingWire
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the steady device is set on the working wire.

PropertyDef.Name: SteadyDeviceType
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of Steady Device: To indicate the mode of registration.
